name: WooCommere Invoice Me
author: Anas

sections.description:
WooCommerce Checkout without making payment rather select Invoice Me to make manual payment or payment later for known customers. This option is available only for selected and logged in customers.

Pro Version Features
* Allow user role to set invoice me checkout. So all user of that user role can checkout using invoice me gateway.
* Invoice Mark as Paid. See screenshot below for pro features.

Pro version is available here
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/woo-invoice-me directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Enable this gateway from WooCommerce settings /wp-admin/admin.php?page=wc-settings&tab=checkout&section=invoiceme
sections.faq:
Will it work for all user?

No, this plugin only work for selected customers/users. Need to allow from user edit page.

short_description: WooCommere Invoice Me Payment Gateway Extends WooCommerce Payment Gateway allow selected customer to checkout without payment.
description:

screenshots.caption: The screenshot (assets/screenshot-1.png) show gateway common settings, here all fields are self descriptive.
The screenshot (assets/screenshot-2.png) show user edit page where admin can allow selected customers
The screenshot (assets/screenshot-3.png) Show front end payment gateway select to pay using Invoice Me.
The screenshot (assets/screenshot-4.png) Show admin order list with Invoice Me. Where admin can mark as Invoice Sent.
The screenshot (assets/screenshot-5.png) Show pro version features
